name: The Legend of ice soul
description:
The Legnend of ice soul a Great puzzle game 

you have extinguish the fires with the ice cube and slove the puzzles

we use the amazing  pixel art to make tiles and sprites of our game

Controls :

right and left keys to move and push the ice cube

space key to create ot destroy the ice cube

There are 8 levels and 1 boss  so far. Enjoy :)
